name: FlameBall
description:
2 Player. Each player controls a dragon as they try to swat a flameball past eachother.

Simple but fun gameplay

Runs fine in MegaDrive/Genesis emulator, or on original hardware (likely using an Everdrive cartridge).

Original source code available here: https://github.com/TheSofox/FlameBall

Uses SGDK as a development platform, so thanks to Stephane-D
